## Service

What service/provider is this for? (e.g., Sentry, Datadog, Firebase)

## Environment Variables

What env vars does this service typically require?

```bash
SENTRY_DSN=https://xxx@xxx.ingest.sentry.io/xxx
SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN=sntrys_xxx
```

## Documentation

Link to the service's docs for getting API keys:

## Auto-Discovery

Is there a way to auto-detect this service locally? (e.g., Docker container, config file)

## Optional Features

Any conditional features? (e.g., `sentry({ tunnel: true })` adds `SENTRY_TUNNEL_URL`)
